Home > Local History > Death Records > Mortality Lists from 1850, 1860, 1870, & 1880 Censuses

Mortality LIsts from the 1850, 1860, 1870, & 1880 Censuses

The 1850, 1860, 1870 and 1880 censuses contain mortality records which are deaths for the preceding 12 months. The census was taken in June so the record of deaths is from June of the preceding year. A death in August of the 1850 census would mean that the death occurred in August of 1849.

Miss Mary Hill copied the Mortality Lists from 1850, 1860, 1870, and 1880 Censuses of Jefferson County, Indiana.
